https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k8eyklFp7QngUrNm6OaZrzPGHNw.jpg In an era of ignorance, being a gifted performer doesn't shield you from the spekter of racism. A passionate and dedicated black dancer in 1930s America is asked to dance by the prestigious Ballet Russe, but they want her to paint her skin white. Dancing in the Light: The Janet Collins Story
